meaningMnemonic: When your <radical>eye</radical> catches an <radical>omen</radical>, it's only natural that you will <kanji>stare</kanji> at it.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>stare</kanji> at the omen, you see Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) knocking down buildings, putting nails on the street, and making herself way longer than you ever thought possible. Oh, and there she is, destroying the world.
